KmsKeyIdentifier.description: The AWS KMS customer master key (CMK) that should be used for the AWS KMS encryption. To specify a CMK, use its key ID, Amazon Resource Name (ARN), alias name, or alias ARN.

DefaultTimeToLive.description: Default TTL (Time To Live) in seconds, where zero is disabled. If the value is greater than zero, TTL is enabled for the entire table and an expiration timestamp is added to each column.
DefaultTimeToLive.markdownDescription:
Default TTL (Time To Live) in seconds, where zero is disabled. If the value is greater than zero, TTL is enabled for the entire table and an expiration timestamp is added to each column.
